[RoadStreetIntersectionSolutions]
; format:
; name=roadMajorTypesFlag,streetMajorTypesFlag,textureId,rotation,flip
;
; name is really not used and is just for our reference. 
; the flag byte order is SENW (I think?)
;

; transition straight road into straight street
RWSE=0x00000002,0x00020000,0x00AA0100,3,0
RNSS=0x00000200,0x02000000,0x00AA0100,0,0
RESW=0x00020000,0x00000002,0x00AA0100,1,0
RSSN=0x02000000,0x00000200,0x00AA0100,2,0
; transition straight road into end street
RESN=0x00020000,0x00000200,0x00AA0200,0,0
RSSE=0X02000000,0X00020000,0X00AA0200,1,0
RWSS=0X00000002,0X02000000,0X00AA0200,2,0
RNSW=0X00000200,0X00000002,0X00AA0200,3,0
RWSN=0X00000002,0X00000200,0X00AA0200,0,1
RNSE=0X00000200,0X00020000,0X00AA0200,3,1
RESS=0X00020000,0X02000000,0X00AA0200,2,1
RSSW=0X02000000,0X00000002,0X00AA0200,1,1
; transition straight road into corner street
RESWN=0X00020000,0X00000202,0X00AA0300,0,0
RSSNE=0X02000000,0X00020200,0X00AA0300,1,0
RWSES=0X00000002,0X02020000,0X00AA0300,2,0
RNSWS=0X00000200,0X02000002,0X00AA0300,3,0
RWSNE=0X00000002,0X00020200,0X00AA0300,0,1
RSSWN=0X02000000,0X00000202,0X00AA0300,1,1
RESSW=0X00020000,0X02000002,0X00AA0300,2,1
RNSES=0X00000200,0X02020000,0X00AA0300,3,1
; transition straight road into middle street
RESNS=0X00020000,0X02000200,0X00AA0400,0,0
RSSEW=0X02000000,0X00020002,0X00AA0400,1,0
RWSNS=0X00000002,0X02000200,0X00AA0400,2,0
RNSEW=0X00000200,0X00020002,0X00AA0400,3,0
; transition straight road into t-intersection street
RESSNW=0X00020000,0X02000202,0X00AA0500,0,0
RSSENW=0X02000000,0X00020202,0X00AA0500,1,0
RWSSEN=0X00000002,0X02020200,0X00AA0500,2,0
RNSSEW=0X00000200,0X02020002,0X00AA0500,3,0
; transition straight road into no exit street
RSS0=0x02000000,0X00000000,0X00AA0100,2,0
RES0=0X00020000,0X00000000,0X00AA0100,1,0
RNS0=0X00000200,0X00000000,0X00AA0100,0,0
RWS0=0X00000002,0X00000000,0X00AA0100,3,0
; transition corner road into straight street
RWNSS=0X00000202,0X02000000,0X00AA0700,0,0
RNESW=0X00020200,0X00000002,0X00AA0700,1,0
RESSN=0X02020000,0X00000200,0X00AA0700,2,0
RWSSE=0X02000002,0X00020000,0X00AA0700,3,0
RWNSE=0X00000202,0X00020000,0X00AA0700,1,1
RNESS=0X00020200,0X02000000,0X00AA0700,0,1
RESSW=0X02020000,0X00000002,0X00AA0700,3,1
RWSSN=0X02000002,0X00000200,0X00AA0700,2,1
; transition corner road into corner street
RWNSES=0X00000202,0X02020000,0X00AA0900,0,0
RNESSW=0X00020200,0X02000002,0X00AA0900,1,0
RESSWN=0X02020000,0X00000202,0X00AA0900,2,0
RWSSNE=0X02000002,0X00020200,0X00AA0900,3,0
; transition straight road into straight street (T)
RWESS=0X00020002,0X02000000,0X00AA0800,0,0
RNSSE=0X02000200,0X00020000,0X00AA0800,3,0
RNSSW=0X02000200,0X00000002,0X00AA0800,1,0
RWESN=0X00020002,0X00000200,0X00AA0800,2,0
; transition straight road into straight street (4-way)
RWESNS=0X00020002,0X02000200,0X00AA0A00,0,0
RNSSWE=0X02000200,0X00020002,0X00AA0A00,1,0
; transition t-intersection road into straight street
RWNESS=0X00020202,0X02000000,0X00AA0B00,0,0
RNESSW=0X02020200,0X00000002,0X00AA0B00,1,0
RWESSN=0X02020002,0X00000200,0X00AA0B00,2,0
RWNSSE=0X02000202,0X00020000,0X00AA0B00,3,0
;diagonal road, straight street
1=0X00000301,0X00020002,0X00AA0C00,2,0

;road diagonal IN, street corner

;Double Diagonal Road, Straight Street
;piece 60
;TYPE1=0x03010301,0x00020002,0x5F032D00,1,1
;TYPE2=0x01030103,0x02000200,0x5F032D00,2,1
;TYPE3=0x01030103,0x00020002,0x5F032D00,3,0
;TYPE4=0x03010301,0x02000200,0x5F032D00,0,0


;Update 100306 ~ memo
;--diagonal streets--
;
;transition diag road into diag street

;--Flex Turning Lanes--
;RD2-to-TL starter
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000100,0x5B204000,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00010000,0x5B204000,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000000,0x5B204000,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000001,0x5B204000,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00000300,0x5B204000,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00030000,0x5B204000,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03000000,0x5B204000,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000003,0x5B204000,1,1
;RD2-to-ML starter
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00040100,0x5B204400,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04010000,0x5B204400,1,0

;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000401,0x5B204400,3,0

;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04000003,0x5B204400,1,1
;ARD3-to-TL starter

;AVE2-to-TL starter
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03000100,0x5B204200,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00010003,0x5B204200,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000300,0x5B204200,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00030001,0x5B204200,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01000300,0x5B204200,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00030001,0x5B204200,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03000100,0x5B204200,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00010003,0x5B204200,1,1

;TL-to-TL transition
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01000100,0x5B204800,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00010001,0x5B204800,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03000300,0x5B204800,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00030003,0x5B204800,1,1
;ARD3-to-ML transition
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03040400,0x5B204700,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04040003,0x5B204700,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04000304,0x5B204700,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00030404,0x5B204700,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01000404,0x5B204700,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00040401,0x5B204700,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04040100,0x5B204700,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04010004,0x5B204700,1,1
;TLA3-to-ML transition
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01040400,0x5B204500,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04040001,0x5B204500,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04000104,0x5B204500,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00010404,0x5B204500,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03000404,0x5B204500,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00040403,0x5B204500,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x04040300,0x5B204500,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04030004,0x5B204500,1,1
;AVE2-to-ML transition
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x03040100,0x5B204600,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04010003,0x5B204600,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000304,0x5B204600,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00030401,0x5B204600,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01000304,0x5B204600,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x00020002,0x00030401,0x5B204600,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x02000200,0x03040100,0x5B204600,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020002,0x04010003,0x5B204600,1,1
;ML-to-TL transition:::::TODO copy 0x5B204500
;TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01040100, TODO ,0,0
;TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04010001, TODO ,1,0
;TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000104, TODO ,2,0
;TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00010401, TODO ,3,0
;ML-to-ML transition (optional)
;TYPE1=0x02000200,0x01040104,0x5B200F00,0,0
;TYPE2=0x00020002,0x04010401,0x5B200F00,1,0
